item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.0 ✓ purrr 0.3.3 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.0 ✓ dplyr 0.8.5 ## ✓ tidyr 1.0.2 ✓ stringr 1.
